title: Keema Matar
procedure: Heat mustard oil in a pan and sauté onions till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and cook till the raw smell disappears.
Add minced lamb and sauté on high heat for 10 minutes.
Add turmeric, red chili powder, and coriander powder.
Pour in milk and cook till the mixture thickens.
Add green peas and cook for another 10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with naan or rice.
